scripts.start:frontend: cd frontend && cross-env REACT_APP_PROXY=http://localhost:5000 npm run start
scripts.prebuild: cd frontend && cross-env REACT_APP_PROXY=http://weathrio-dev.us-east-1.elasticbeanstalk.com npm run build && cd ..
scripts.build: copyfiles -f frontend/build/* backend/static && copyfiles -f frontend/build/static/css/* backend/static/static/css && copyfiles -f frontend/build/static/js/* backend/static/static/js
